0.0.1.name: wordpress/predictive-404
0.0.1.description:
Another plugin inspired by Russ Jones' post on SEOMoz, this plugin assists in PageRank recovery by:

  • Capturing the URL that the visitor or GoogleBot tried to visit.
  • Using Levenshtein Distance to figure out the intended URL.
  • 301 redirecting to there

For example, browsing to http://gunnertech.com/internet-markteing will automagically redirect to http://gunnertech.com/internet-marketing

For any more questions, please go to Gunner Technology's post: Predictive 404: WordPress Plugin that Recovers your PageRank and leave a comment.
